divs: Sighting DetailsWitness was at the Mid-Ohio race track,when he got up to go walking,because of his back,while looking into the sky he saw a triangle shaped craft flying silently from the northeast to the southwest,it hd white lights at each of the three corners,no sound was heard and no type of comtrail was seen,he advised that he folded a piece of paper into a triangle,like the kids used to do in school to play football on their desks and held it up to the sky,and this was about the size of the craft in the air,it was about 15-20 degrees above the horizon,and the craft took off after about 5 seconds at a high rate of speed,still with no noise. The weather was clear,no cloud cover and he said that when the craft flew in front of a star it blocked out the light,no animals were heard,but the race track campgrounds has a no pet rule,sill no unusual sounds were heard.No moon was out either. Witnesses statement will be uploaded.
